experience.title: Frontend Developer Intern
experience.description:
- Revamped over 60 web pages to modernize the website, elevating user engagement and ensuring an intuitive interface that resulted in a measurable increase in user satisfaction metrics gathered through post-launch surveys.
- Collaborated with a small team of 2 developers over 6 months to deliver a high-quality web solution.
- Maintained consistent communication to gather requirements, provide updates, and successfully developed 3+ websites.

experience.title: Chief Design Officer
experience.description:
- Led the creative direction for a team of 5+ designers and developers, ensuring alignment with brand vision and user needs.
-  Transformed the platform’s UI/UX by designing intuitive navigation features, leading to a 20% surge in user engagement and enhanced customer satisfaction metrics based on direct feedback from usability testing sessions.

experience.title: Full Stack Software Development Intern
experience.description:
- Evolved and launched 2 fully functional websites as a frontend developer, ensuring seamless user experiences and adherence to project deadlines.
- Tailored and implemented responsive web designs, increasing user engagement by 38% through refined accessibility and cross-device compatibility.
- Migrated the entire codebase to Vite, reducing development cycle times by 25%, resulting in faster feature delivery and team productivity better than before.

experience.title: Associate - Norman Lab
experience.description: Led the development of the admin portal for NextTech Lab, ensuring robust architecture and smooth user experiences, resulting in a 25% improvement in task completion time. Utilised modern frameworks to deliver scalable and maintainable code, supporting future scalability for up to 1000+ users.
